name: Helen Bracelet in Copper, Sterling Silver, Citrine, Victorian Steampunk Style #5750
description:
Helen Bracelet #5750

An ID-style chainmaille bracelet with a steampunk flavor.

“Helen” 's rectangular focal, hand-sculpted in warm copper, is bisected by four citrine beads of varying hue, and flanked by lines of sterling silver beads.  Softening the regimentation are two graceful filigree curves of sterling silver.

Hand-cut, hand-linked Byzantine chainmaille encircles the wrist in copper with sterling silver accents.  A sterling silver hook, accented with copper and citrine, hold it all together.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

Dimensions:
Bracelet is 7 1/2” around, and is ½ inch wide at the widest point.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Not intended for children under age 12.

name: Dearest 20 Inch Sterling Silver Necklace Rose Garland Circle Design #3735
description:
The centerpiece of my series "Dearest: Interpretations Of Victorian Sentimental Jewelry", “Dearest” makes a big statement.

Sentimental jewelry was quite popular in the 19th century. One of the ways people expressed love was by giving jewelry set with gemstones whose initials spelled a word, like “DEAREST” or “REGARD”.

First, I wove a circle from strands of sterling silver wire. Why did I choose a circle? Circles signify eternity.

Then I formed roses and leaves, by hand, from sterling silver and 14k goldfill wire, arranging them into a draping garland. The rose garland is bound to the circle with my trademark beaded ribbon.  The ribbon not only winds around the rose garland several times, it actually wraps around the chain!

The larger roses, and the leaves, are embellished with gemstone beads whose initials spell “DEAREST”. They are: Diamond (Black), Emerald, Amethyst, Ruby, Emerald, Sapphire, and Tourmaline.
The pendant portion of “Dearest” hangs suspended from a double chain of sterling silver.

As you can see in the photos, the hook clasps are also sculpted and woven by hand of sterling silver wire and 14k goldfill beads.

Like all my art jewelry, "Dearest" was made without solder, without castings, without glue, without torch.

Dimensions: 
Pendant portion of necklace measures 2 3/4” long by 1 1/4” wide.
Necklace is 20” long.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Please keep in mind that your necklace requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Regard Love-Knot-Style Pendant In Sterling Silver and Gemstones #4731
description:
The original “REGARD” pendant, in sculpted sterling silver, and the six gemstones spelling “REGARD”.

"REGARD" is part of my series titled "Dearest: Interpretations Of Victorian Sentimental Jewelry".

I took strands of sterling silver wire and sculpted them into a love-knot shape, weaving in the six classic gems whose first initials spell “REGARD”:

Ruby
Emerald
Garnet
Amethyst
Ruby
Diamond (Black)

Then I contrasted the fine-gauge weaving with graceful sculpture. The 6 x 4 mm bail is set off with swirled sculpted wire, as well as sterling silver beads.

NOTE: Chain is NOT included. You get the pendant only.

Pendant measures 1 1/4 inches long (from top of bail to lower edge of sculpture) by 7/8 inch wide.  It is small, comfortable, and eminently wearable.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Regard Love-Knot-Style Pendant In Sterling Silver and Tourmaline #4730
description:
A limited-edition version of the "Regard" pendant, done in six shades of genuine tourmaline.

"Regard" is part of my series titled "Dearest: Interpretations Of Victorian Sentimental Jewelry".

I took strands of sterling silver wire and sculpted them into an love-knot shape, weaving in six genuine tourmalines in light green, shades of pink, and black.  Then I set off the fine-gauge weaving with graceful sculpture.  The 5 mm bail is set off with swirled sculpted wire as well.

NOTE: Chain is NOT included.  You get the pendant only.

Pendant measures 1 3/8 inches long (from top of bail to lower edge of sculpture) by 3/4 inch wide.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora 2 Sterling Silver Earrings In Citrine #1734
description:
Darling little earrings, measuring only 3/4 inch long.

Pear-shaped citrines are suspended on a "cage" of sterling silver wire, and draped with a sterling silver bead "ribbon", all hand-sculpted.

Inspired by my Aunt Teddy, born in 1901, and the times she lived so briefly in.

These are designed to be “asymmetrically symmetrical”.  What does that mean for you?  It means that you can thread these on and go, because they are facing the right way either way.

Earwires are sterling silver, and they hook closed at the bottom of the earrings, keeping them in your ears where they belong.

Earring sculptures measure 3/4 inch long by 1/4 inch wide.  Total hanging length 1 1/16 inches.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that these earrings require a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have them shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora Rainbow Ring in Cultured Pearl #8705
description:
Influenced by the grace of Art Nouveau design, I present the Theodora Rainbow Ring, with its undulating wave of colorful gemstone beads.

This ring is completely hand-sculpted of sterling silver wire.

Once I fabricated the ring base, I sculpted in some curves and curls, and added gemstone beads:
--genuine emerald
--genuine ruby
--genuine sapphire
--genuine yellow sapphire

Then I sculpted in a couple of circles for cultured pearls to nestle into, all embroidered together with fine-gauge sterling silver wire.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

As you can see in the photos, the ring shank is slim, for comfort.

The top of the ring is 1/2 inch wide, and rises 3/16 inch from the finger.

This particular ring is approximately a size 6. 

Due to the nature of sculpted wire jewelry, this ring cannot be re-sized, by me or anyone else. Re-sizing involves a completely new "build".

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

name: Sterling Silver Circle Pendant in Genuine Ruby, Rose Quartz, Garnet #4668
description:
Memory's Mirror 2 Pendant In Sterling Silver, Ruby, Rose Quartz, Garnet, Cultured Pearl #4668

Not really a mirror, but if it was, any lady would love gazing into this.  

I formed a circle from sterling silver jewelers wire, which I then wove together with fine-gauge sterling silver.  Using the remaining strands of jewelers wire, I formed a beaded-ribbon-bound bouquet of flowers accented with:
--genuine ruby beads
--rose quartz beads
--a garnet bead
--cultured pearls 
 
Some of the sterling silver stems form an elongated bail at the top of the circle.  The bail is designed for a 2.5 mm leather cord, but you could replace the cord with your chain.

Memory's Mirror is inspired by the tangible tokens of a cherished memory: the ticket stub, the keepsake photo, the pressed flower...

Vital Statistics:
--2 inches from top of bail to lower edge of curled beaded ribbon.
--1 ¼ inches wide at widest point.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that this pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Garnet, Gold, and Pearl Sculptured Slide Pendant #4719
description:
Theodora Slide Pendant in Garnet, Gold, and Pearl #4719

From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in 12k goldfill, and embellished with richly-hued garnet.

After setting a garnet teardrop in a 12k goldfill harness, I created a "beaded ribbon" effect by weaving together 12k goldfill wire, studding it with tiny white cultured pearls as I worked. The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the garnet teardrop, and down, finally curling around another garnet drop.

Freely sculpted and curled 12k goldfill wire sets off the other side of the garnet teardrop for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon. A cultured pearl and round garnet bead add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included. However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

Vital Statistics:
Slide pendant sculpture measures just over 1 ¼ inches long by 5/8 inch wide.
Bail is 2 mm diameter.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift. It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail. I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be

name: Blue Topaz and Pearl Slide Pendant in Sterling Silver #4720
description:
From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in sterling silver and embellished with icy blue topaz and cool blue chalcedony.

After setting a marquis-shaped blue topaz briolette in a sterling silver harness, I created a "beaded ribbon" effect by weaving together sterling silver wire, studding it with tiny cultured pearls as I worked. The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the blue topaz briolette, and down, finally curling around a blue chalcedony bead.

Freely sculpted and curled sterling silver wire sets off the other side of the blue topaz briolette for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon. A cultured pearl and round blue chalcedony bead add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

I usually antique my silver pieces, but I left this one in bright silver.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included. However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

Vital Statistics:
Slide pendant sculpture measures just over 1 ¼ inches long by 5/8 inch wide.
Bail is 2 mm diameter.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift. It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail. I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora Slide Pendant in Sterling Silver and Amethyst #4718
description:
From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in sterling silver and embellished with delicately-shaded Brazilian amethyst.

After setting an amethyst teardrop in a sterling silver harness, I created a “beaded ribbon” effect by weaving together sterling silver wire, studding it with sterling silver beads as I worked.  The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the amethyst teardrop, and down, finally curling around another amethyst drop.

Freely sculpted and curled sterling silver wire sets off the other side of the amethyst teardrop for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon.  A cultured pearl and round amethyst bead add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

Even though the amethysts are more of a lavender hue, I lightly antiqued the silver anyway, for depth.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included.  However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

Vital Statistics:
Slide pendant sculpture measures just over 1 ¼ inches long by 5/8 inch wide.
Bail is 2 mm diameter.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora Bracelet in Black Onyx Cultured Pearl #5724
description:
Blending the best of Art Nouveau and Victoriana, I present the Theodora Bracelet, hand-sculpted in sterling silver wire, and adorned with black onyx and cultured pearl.

I engineered and cold-fabricated the bracelet frame, using only sterling silver wire, then set a glossy black onyx cabochon in the center.

Then I hand-sculpted more sterling silver wire, creating a bead-studded ribbon effect, flanking the black onyx cab.  Black onyx beads and white cultured pearls add the finishing touches to the bracelet top.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

The chainmaille part of the bracelet is hand-wound and hand-linked, by me, of sterling silver wire.

The hook clasp is also hand-sculpted by me.  It is sterling silver wire, with the beaded ribbon effect repeated, and finished off with a black onyx bead accent.

Like all the Theodora Collection, this piece is inspired by my great-great Aunt Teddy, and the times she lived so briefly in.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that this bracelet requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora Slide Pendant in Sterling Silver and Garnet #4729
description:
From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in sterling silver and embellished with genuine garnets.

After setting a garnet teardrop in a sterling silver harness, I created a “beaded ribbon” effect by weaving together sterling silver wire, studding it with sterling silver beads as I worked.  The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the garnet teardrop, and down, ending in a garnet-adorned curl.

Freely sculpted and curled sterling silver wire sets off the other side of the garnet teardrop for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon.  Tiny garnet beads add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

I antiqued the silver for depth.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included.  However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

name: Theodora Slide Pendant in 12k Goldfill, Amethyst, Cultured Pearl #4728
description:
From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in 12k goldfill wire** and embellished with genuine AAA-grade amethyst and cultured pearls.

After setting the amethyst trillion* in a 12k goldfill harness, I created a “beaded ribbon” effect by weaving together 12k goldfill wire, studding it with tiny cultured pearls as I worked.  The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the amethyst trillion, and down, ending in an amethyst-bedecked curl.

Freely sculpted and curled 12k goldfill wire sets off the other side of the amethyst trillion for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon.  An amethyst bead and a cultured pearl add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included.  However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

Vital Statistics:
Slide pendant sculpture measures just over 1 ¼ inches long by 5/8 inch wide.
Bail is 2 mm diameter.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that your pendant requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

* A trillion is a triangle with rounded sides.

** Goldfill wire is NOT gold plate.  Goldfill is made by heat-and-pressure bonding a thick layer of gold to a base metal like brass.

name: Theodora Slide Pendant in Sterling Silver and Crystal #4727
description:
From under the spell of Art Nouveau styling comes the Theodora Slide Pendant, hand-sculpted in sterling silver and embellished with genuine Swarovski crystals.

After setting a crystal teardrop in a sterling silver harness, I created a “beaded ribbon” effect by weaving together sterling silver wire, studding it with sterling silver beads as I worked.  The beaded ribbon wraps up and over the leather cord, past the crystal teardrop, and down, ending in a crystal-adorned curl.

Freely sculpted and curled sterling silver wire sets off the other side of the crystal teardrop for a marked contrast to the uniformly beaded ribbon.  Tiny crystal beads add the finishing touches to the sculpture.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

Though this piece is done with Swarovski crystals, I antiqued the silver anyway, for depth.

The Theodora Slide Pendant is designed to hang on a 2 mm diameter leather cord, which is included.  However, if you prefer, you can remove the leather cord and substitute your own chain.

Vital Statistics:
Slide pendant sculpture measures just over 1 ¼ inches long by 5/8 inch wide.

--genuine emerald

name: Theodora Necklace Sterling Silver and Garnet #3729
description:
NOTE: The Theodora Necklace has been entered for consideration for the Wisconsin Biennial.

Art-Nouveau-Inspired Theodora Necklace

Is it a necklace, or is it art?

Both.

A deep red garnet rests in the center of an oh-so-proper sterling silver frame, caressed by sculpted beaded ribbon.

But then...the beaded ribbon bursts out of the frame, through one of the corner curls, around the necklace chain, and ends up swirling around a garnet bead!

The garnet-bead-accented sterling silver chain passes through a hidden bail behind the swirl.  The chain appears to be pinched behind the swirl, but really isn't.

I hand-sculpted the hook-and-eye clasp especially for this necklace - they are beaded as well.

The Theodora Necklace, like the whole Theodora Series, is inspired by my great-great aunt Teddy, and the times she lived so briefly in.

--20-inch chain
--Pendant portion measures nearly 3 inches long by 7/8 inch wide at widest point.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that this necklace requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Theodora Ring Sterling Silver Blue Chalcedony Size 7 #8703
description:
Capturing all the exuberance of the Art Nouveau Age, I present the Theodora Ring, as rendered in sterling silver and blue chalcedony.

This ring is completely hand-sculpted of sterling silver wire.

Once I fabricated the ring base, I sculpted in some curves and curls, studding the curve with sterling silver beads.  Then I sculpted in a couple of circles for blue chalcedony beads to nestle into, all embroidered together with fine-gauge sterling silver wire.

No solder, no castings, no glue, no torch.

As you can see in the photos, the ring shank is slim, for comfort, and is wrapped in sterling silver wire for a smooth, silky feeling on your finger.

The top of the ring is 7/16 inch wide, and rises 3/16 inch from the finger.

This particular ring is approximately a size seven.  The stabilizing wires make it difficult to accurately determine the size.

Due to the nature of sculpted wire jewelry, this ring cannot be re-sized, by me or anyone else.  Re-sizing involves a completely new "build".

name: Theodora Earrings in Sterling Silver and Black Onyx #1714
description:
Attention-getting statement earrings in sterling silver and black onyx.

I sculpted sterling silver wire around a black onyx cabochon so that the onyx appeared to be caressed by beaded ribbon, then I added sterling-silver-encircled black onyx beads at both ends of the earring sculpture.

I topped the earrings off with sterling silver leverback earwires, so they will never fall out of your ears.

Earring sculptures measure 1 7/8 inches long by 1/2 inch wide.  Total hanging length is 2 1/2 inches.

The Theodora Earrings are inspired by my great-great aunt Teddy, and the times she lived so briefly in.

name: Samantha Earrings in Sterling Silver, Mother Of Pearl, Blue Chalcedony #1509
description:
These romantic Victorian Gothic earrings, like all the fine art jewelry in my Boutique, are hand-sculpted by me in sterling silver jeweler's wire.

12mm square mother-of-pearl cabochons are encased in sterling silver wire, then the remaining wire is sculpted into an ornate rococo motif above each cabochon.  Tiny blue chalcedony beads and sterling silver beads liberally embellish the sculpture.  The earrings are topped with sterling silver leverback earwires, so you won't lose them.

It's difficult to photograph mother-of-pearl well enough to bring out the pink-blue-green iridescence, but rest assured these cabs have a lovely iridescence.

Earring sculptures measure 1 inch long by 5/8 inch wide.  The beaded sterling silver links add another 1 ¼ inches of length.  Total hanging length 2 ¼ inches.

Not intended for children under age 12.

name: Samantha Earrings in Sterling Silver, Rose Quartz, and Cultured Pearl #1501
description:
These romantic Victorian Gothic earrings, like all the fine art jewelry in my Boutique, are hand-sculpted by me in sterling silver jeweler's wire.

10mm square rose quartz cabochons are encased in sterling silver wire, then the remaining wire is sculpted into an ornate rococo motif above each cabochon.  

Tiny cultured pearls and sterling silver beads liberally embellish the sculpture.  

The earrings are topped with sterling silver leverback earwires, so you won't lose them.

In one of the photos, a stabilizing wire can be seen behind the cabochon, however, that wire is not noticeable in real life.

Earring sculptures measure 1 inch long by 5/8 inch wide.  Total hanging length is 1 ½ inches.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

name: Samantha Claire Bracelet in Sterling Silver, Blue Mist Agate, Cultured Pearl #5556
description:
Presenting...Samantha Claire in Blue Mist Agate, Sterling Silver, and Cultured Pearls.

This bracelet began, as all my art jewelry does, with straight strands of sterling silver wire, a gemstone, and a vision.

You may have heard of, and/or seen, Blue Lace Agate, a banded light blue stone.  Well, this is Blue Mist Agate - it has no banding, just a translucent, periwinkle blue.

This particular stone was set into a gold ring setting for many years until I re-purposed it into this show-stopping bracelet.

I hand-sculpted the sterling silver wire into this baroque-style setting - no solder, no castings, no glue, no heat.  Just sculpture, "stitched" together with fine gauge sterling silver wire, and embellished with sterling silver beads and tiny cultured pearls.

The bracelet chain is of sterling silver wire also.  The rings are hand-wound by me, then woven together chainmaille-style.

Finally, the connector and hook clasp are both hand-sculpted by me, embellished with beads.  Please see the photos to see how Samantha Claire clasps on the side.

Samantha Claire in Blue Mist Agate measures approximately 7 inches around, and is just a shade under an inch wide at the widest point.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

Please keep in mind that this bracelet requires a signature upon delivery, so be sure to have it shipped to a location where you or your representative will physically be.

name: Till We Meet Again Ear Cuff Chain in Garnet #1902
description:
You don't need a special piercing to wear this - if your earlobes are pierced, you are good to go!   I hand-sculpted a tiny ear cuff of sterling silver wire and copper wire, and embellished it with sterling silver beads.  Then I hand-linked a delicate Byzantine-style chain, and placed a hand-shaped sterling silver earwire at the end.  I finished the piece off with a genuine faceted garnet teardrop.

Please see the photos to see how this stunning ear cuff is worn.  The cuff simply slips on to the thickest part of the outer ear, then the earwire is hooked thru your pierced earlobe.

Not intended for children under age 12.

name: Daughters Of Zeus 14k Goldfill Necklace #3711
description:
Inspired by a brooch motif I found in a book of Victorian jewelry, I re-interpreted it as the focal point of this ornate Victorian-style necklace.

Three blue chalcedony beads are set off by swirls of 14k goldfill and sterling silver wire, then the motif is set in a tall, thin “Dear John”-style frame.  I further embellished the frame with sculpted swirls and vines of 14k goldfill and sterling silver.

  Whether you're boho, biker, neo-Victorian, Renaissance, or Art Nouveau, the Daughters Of Zeus necklace blends with your style.

Pendant sculpture measures 1 7/8 inches long by 3/4 inch wide.  Chain, in 14k goldfill, is 18 inches long, embellished with sterling silver beads and finished off with handcrafted clasp.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry ships cushioned in a red leatherette box that you'll be proud to present as a gift.  It is packed securely in a shipping box, then shipped via USPS Priority Mail.  I will email the tracking number.

name: Mysticale Earrings in Sterling Silver Amethyst Yellow Sapphire #1680
description:
I began with  AAA-grade amethyst briolettes in a rich violet-purple hue, then the fun started as I swirled, curled, and intertwined sterling silver wire around the briolettes in a baroque style.  I selected sapphire beads in a complementary yellow shade, and added those, along with tiny sterling silver beads for winks of light.

The embellished post is adorned with a yellow sapphire bead, as well as a short bit of sterling silver rolo chain.  The main part of the earring swings back and forth below the embellished post, moving with every turn of your head.

These earrings appear heavy, but they're not.

Earrings measure 1 ½ inches long by 5/8 inch wide at widest point. Posts are sterling silver.

Stabilizing earring backs are included with these earrings.

Not intended for children under age 12.

description:
NOTE: These earrings are available from Alpaca Boutique in Gordonsville, Virginia. 540-832-3075.  The price may differ.

Show-stopping teardrop earrings, in 14k gold-fill and sterling silver, showcasing topaz briolettes of the lightest blue, flanked by bright sterling silver swirling and curling its way up. 

The briolettes are blue mystic topaz, a light blue with undertones of pinkish-lilac.  Unusual and gorgeous.

Above the topaz, a sterling silver bead seems to float within a diamond frame of 14k gold-fill. Tiny sterling silver beads add highlights, while the earrings are topped with handcrafted 14k gold-filled earwires.

name: Lola 3 Heart Pendant In 14k Goldfill Sterling Silver Amethyst #7053
description:
A delightful combination of machinery and confection in 14k goldfill and sterling silver.

Gold-filled wire and sterling silver wire are hand-formed into the heart shape, then hand-woven, with lots of fine-gauge gold-filled wire, in a block pattern for a mechanical look.  The sterling silver rosette forms the focal point, accented by sinuous art nouveau details in 14k goldfill. One small amethyst bead offsets the rosette. A large amethyst teardrop briolette hangs suspended below the heart.
The sterling silver rosette is antiqued to bring out the detail.

Pendant measures 2 1/2 inches long from top of bail to bottom of amethyst briolette. 
It measures 1 1/8 inches wide at the widest point. 
Bail will accept chains or beads up to 4mm diameter.

Not intended for children under 12.

description:
Not really mirrors, but if they were, any lady would love gazing into these. Sterling silver jewelers wire forms circles, which are woven together with hair-fine sterling silver. More sterling silver twirls and vines around the circles, while embracing small beads of garnet. Sterling silver beads add the final accents. description:

name: Lola 1 Heart Slide Pendant Sterling Silver Bronze Pearl #7024
description:
Strands of sterling silver jewelers wire are sculpted into a teardrop, then "embroidered" together into a heart with fine-gauge sterling silver wire, with fine rolo chain tracing the outline like lace. The heart frames a rose of bronze, accented by a single cultured freshwater pearl. The rose's stem seemingly swirls right out of the teardrop, ending in a silver-bead-accented pair of leaves. The piece is antiqued, then buffed and polished for an ageless look. Genuine leather cord passes thru hidden bails in back, and is adjustable.

Pendant measures 1 1/4 inches long by 1 1/8 inches wide at widest point
Leather cord can be replaced with your chain 2 mm diameter

Not intended for children under age 12.

name: Winter Magick Necklace In Sterling Silver Bronze Pearl Crystal #3605
description:
Against the backdrop of an arched window, cultured pearls are the pillows of snow resting on the remains of last summer's leaves and flowers. Spring vines that trailed their way up the window frame are now frozen there. Swarovski crystals hint at icicles. Winter's beauty and magic, captured in sterling silver and bronze wire.

The window sculpture hangs suspended from a pearl-accented bronze rose, which connects it to a sterling silver handcrafted chain. The necklace adjusts from 16 inches to 18 inches.

Winter Magick is the fourth and final necklace in the Seasons Nouveau collectible series.

Pendant measures 1 inch wide at widest point, by 1 3/8 inches long

Some Swarovski crystals contain lead. Due to this, and to the nature of sculpted wire jewelry, this necklace is not intended for children under age 12.

name: Bittersweet Autumn Necklace in Sterling Silver Copper Carnelian #3604
description:
A tribute to the exuberance of the fall colors, and the foreboding of the coming winter. Dying vines curl and cling tenaciously to the frame of a gothic-style arched window, while the autumn yellows, oranges, and ambers glow defiantly in Winter's face. A darkly romantic necklace.

I sculpted and wove sterling silver and copper jewelers wire into the window shape, then curled and twirled more silver and copper wire into vines and leaves. I added tiny carnelian beads and citrine beads for color, then accented with sterling silver beads, gold-filled beads, and copper beads.

Above the pendant part of the necklace, a citrine-accented copper rose connects the pendant to the sterling silver handcrafted chain. The chain adjusts from 17 inches to 19 inches.

Bittersweet Autumn is the third necklace in the Seasons Nouveau collectible series.

Pendant sculpture measures 1 5/8 inches long by 1 inch wide

Not intended for children under age 12.

Your jewelry will ship cushioned in a presentation box, then packed securely in a shipping box, via USPS Priority.  I will email the tracking number.

"Summer Solstice" is sculpted in sterling silver and bronze. Bronze roses grow in the corners of the window, nestled in swirling vines and leaves of sterling silver and bronze. Sterling silver beads add winks of light. Gemstone beads of garnet, amethyst, peridot, and cultured seed pearl add bits of color. The pendant sculpture is suspended from a garnet-accented sterling silver rose, which connects to a completely handcrafted sterling silver chain.

Curling vines of sterling silver and copper seem to look for sunlight. Beads of garnet, labradorite, amethyst, and peridot add hints of color, like spring buds. Sterling silver and copper beads are strategically placed, adding winks of light.

The chain and clasp are completely hand-formed of sterling silver. A garnet-accented sterling silver rose connects the chain to the pendant.

Dark Spring is the first necklace in the Seasons Nouveau collectible series.

name: Samantha Claire Garnet Earrings in Sterling Silver #1550
description:
Beautifully ornate sculpted wire earrings, in my very popular "Samantha" design, set with oval garnet cabochons. Accented with tiny sterling silver beads, then antiqued for depth. Even though most of the photos show these earrings with French hooks, they will have sterling silver leverback earwires on them as shown in the first photo.

Dimensions: Earring sculpture measures 1 1/8 inches (28 mm) long by 5/8 inch (16 mm) wide at widest point. Total hanging length is 1 3/4 inches (43 mm). 

Garnet is a dark red translucent stone, and is the January birthstone. Garnet is believed to boost business success, ease depression, and enhance self-esteem.

Some of the photos may show an occlusion in one of the garnets , but it's not really noticeable in real life, unless strong light is shining through them.

Not intended for children under age 12.

Handwoven sterling silver wire sculpted into a circle, then embellished with sculpted wire swirls and curls. Accented with sterling silver beads and a genuine garnet teardrop briolette. Piece is heavily antiqued.

Black leather cord seen in the photos is included, and is adjustable from 27 inches all the way down to choker length.

The teardrop briolette does not dangle or move much, and is not designed to.

Due to the nature of sculpted wire jewelry, this pendant is not intended for children under age 12.
